tool_description: Corrects UFT8 encoding problems. If you have some wrong characters ..."Ã©" instead of "é" for example (this concerns special and accentuated characters) and that you cannot correct, this may come from a problem of encoding between the file and part of its content, often following problems when creating the file. Send your texts with errors to the API and a corrected text will be returned to you.
name: UTF8 fix encoding
title: UTF8 fix encoding

api_list.name: UTF8FixEncoding
api_list.description: Returns the corrected text. Fixes problems encoding Ansi text containing Unicode characters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://utf8-fix-encoding.p.rapidapi.com/UTF8FixEncoding"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "utf8-fix-encoding.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://utf8-fix-encoding.p.rapidapi.com/UTF8FixEncoding"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
